website_summaries.verdict: This striking 7-piece yoga starter kit has everything you need to tackle yoga like a pro.
pros: 7-piece kit comes with a textured, thick yoga mat, mat towel, 2 yoga blocks to maximize work in certain positions, an 8-foot strap for those hard to reach poses, a hand towel, and a carrying case for it all
Thicker and slightly larger mat is nice for beginners
No PVC, BPA, phlalates, silicone, or latex
cons: Some people find the mat to be slippery and unstable
Several people only received the mat when ordering the kit

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not for me..
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a nice set. The bag fits all items and the blue set I ordered is pretty. However, I returned for 2 reasons. Reason 1, there is no shoulder strap even though some product photos indicated otherwise. My bag came with 2 short handles, not so easy for transporting. Reason 2, the mat is not very comfortable. I prefer a sticky softer mat. This one has nice thickness, but no "give". Shipping was fast and company emailed to ensure delivery, so great customer service. Returned with no problem. 5 stars for service, 3 for product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga kit for beginners like me
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really used it yet (yes, I am a sloth, I know), but I am giving it 5 stars because the items look good and, most importantly, durable, and everything fits inside the bag - with a few more spaces for your water bottle, etc. I also like that they sent e-mails asking about my overall satisfaction with the yoga kit. Even though I rarely reply to those e-mails, at least I know that communicating with the company will be easy if I ever encounter any problems with the product.
customer_reviews.author: MargeneviFRC

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loving this yoga set! The mat is great, very comfortable and stays put on my hardwood floors the bag is perfect, everything fits comfortably with a little room to spare. I did not recieve a carrying bag with a handle that some others have in their review photos, but i feel like its great regardless. I highly recommend its def. worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: A perfect starter set. Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was a great kit to take to yoga teacher training. A nice entry level kit at an exceptional price. I kept the blocks, LOVE the microfiber towels. I use the bag for a lot of things. The mat, I will pass on...it would be perfect for someone with knee problems as it is thick and cushy. Now that I have practiced more, I prefer something thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to replace stuff lost in a house fire. It is a perfect set that fits my needs and has a nice travel kit. I just use it at home, but I like that everything matches and everything seems to be good quality. I recommend it for anyone who needs a good set and likes pretty colors.
customer_reviews.author: LMC

customer_reviews.title: Terrific bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: I got my yoga kit a couple of weeks ago and I am VERY pleased with it---especially the size & quality of the carrying bag. With the blocks out (they have those at the studio), there’s enough room for both my work-out clothes & shoes and my shaving kit. I’m really glad I bought this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: The mat is very comfortable. I have been using it on a hardwood floor with zero discomfort. The blocks are narrower than my previous set, which makes it a little more difficult to balance on, and are very soft (I gauged the side just trying to get the wrapping off) and they scratch up easily. The bag is large enough to accommodate a few extra items without being so large that it's hard to carry or transport. I haven't used the towels or the strap yet, but overall the mat & carrying bag alone are well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit, mat is a little slippery.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the thickness of the mat in this kit. The product itself is very durable and gets the job done, and I'm very happy with the value for the price. My only complaint is that the mat gets super slippery as you get warmed up. I've learned to cover my mat with my towel at the beginning of my session, and that seems to remedy that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the quality of materials (love the subtle lotus pattern/texture on the back of the mat), and definitely the customer service follow-up from Clever Yoga. I will definitely be purchasing extra yoga towels from them, and would recommend this set for sure. On a totally personal-preference note, I would love to see some subtler/more sophisticated color options. The bright colors are completely typical from lots of manufacturers, not just this one, but it would take things up an extra notch for me. I would/will still repurchase regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner and have used this a handful of times. It has worked out well so far for me. It's quite convenient to use and travel with. I can even carry a few additional items in the bag like extra socks and t-shirt and shorts. I like that the towel is quick dry which is helpful for hot yoga.
customer_reviews.author: ElLoboPaciente

customer_reviews.title: Great set for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. The mat is larger than any other mat I’ve seen. This is great for a beginner as myself, giving me plenty of room to move around. This is a fantastic value with a bag, 2 towels, a strap and 2 blocks. It has everything you need to start your practice.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: A good price for the kit.
customer_reviews.text: Price is great, and it's a perfect fit for my needs. Matt is squishy foam and blocks are firm but lightweight. Only 2 things I would change. One, would like cotton terrycloth towels. Two, gym bag would be amazing with a big strap for over the shoulder carry. Still a good price for all you get.
customer_reviews.author: Spiral

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Set
customer_reviews.text: Received all the pieces to this set. Everyone works well and looks like the items described online. The blocks are useful and the Mat does not slip when doing yoga poses. The carrying case is useful and sometimes I use it to carry my extra clothes to the gym. I would buy this again if I needed to do so.
customer_reviews.author: LMC

customer_reviews.title: Overall good quality products
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Clever Yoga for this magnificent yoga ‘outfit’ as a beginner I am not able to give in-depth review but so far I am enjoying the mat and blocks exercises and the towels are more than welcome to keep me dry. The bag is also very handy and spacious so I can carry an extra set of clothes in it with me. Overall good quality products
customer_reviews.author: John Blijd

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, the week has been crazy or I would have gotten back to you sooner. I got the kit and it looks wonderful! I took the wrap off the mat and no smells or anything of that nature. Everything looks well made and I am happy to have made the purchase. Hope to actually try things out at yoga nidra over the weekend. I also purchased an extra pad for my knees and there is plenty of room in the bag for that. Thank you for well-designed equipment. Kind wishes, Julie P.
customer_reviews.author: juplumer

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I don't have point of reference as far as other yoga kits but this one comes with a mat, 2 blocks, a strap, a towel that doesn't stay wet, and a bag to put it all in. The mat is durable and I use it every day. The blocks are a strong compressed foam. The strap seems like seat belt material. Overall I'm pleased with this kit
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Mat Dipped in Fiber Glass... Be aware!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat in September and I didn't open the box until today. Everything came in the box as expected, however the mat was covered in fiber glass. Both my child and I now have irritated skin and throat. The entire mat was looked like it was dipped in glitter. I have no choice but to throw it in the trash now. I just hope there is no long term harm from this.
customer_reviews.author: Tanzeela Aziz

customer_reviews.title: Really love this set
customer_reviews.text: This is everything i need for a workout set at home...my cat loves to sit on it too. Mat is a good thick quality, though i do slip on it a bit, the towel helps stop that. Strap is good strap for stretching and foam blocks are good sturdy quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this kit
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this kit! The mat was think snd the towels are excellent quality. I love the bag that helps keep everything in one place, great for travel. I am going to a Holy Yoga retreat this weekend and I cannot wait to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Rashida Graham

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality on all items. The towels are soft. The mat is comfortable, but not too thick. There is a nice pocket on the outside. There is also a little extra room in the bag for shoes and workout clothes. Did a lot of comparing and this was the best price for a good quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Regina H.

customer_reviews.title: Great merchandise for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this set!! Just like the props at the yoga studio - same quality merchandise! I love the thicker mat and I really love how everything fits into the bag! Plus some room for my water and other items!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Campbell

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Yoga set
customer_reviews.text: We are VERY pleased with this set. Everything is GREAT quality in an easy to carry tote. The mat is much thicker & softer than our previous ones. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Mackey

customer_reviews.title: I have been practicing for many years and this looked like the perfect starter kit for someone just starting out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother-in-law who said she wanted to start yoga. I have been practicing for many years and this looked like the perfect starter kit for someone just starting out. In fact I think I may buy one for myself to take on the road,everything fits into a nice tote bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina sloan

customer_reviews.title: They said they sales the set kit 7 piece, but I only received a yoga mat.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the set with 7 piece. And guess what I got, a yoga mat only! I'm so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Violet Phan

customer_reviews.title: This kit was exactly as described. The mat is great!
customer_reviews.text: My weekly Yoga class resumed today and with the new guidelines we needed to bring our own mats. I purchased this kit because I figured I would also need the strap and blocks. Everything fits nicely in the bag and it is very lightweight. Mat is very comfortable. I am very happy with my purchase and glad to support a small business from the 813.
customer_reviews.author: susan b tibbits

customer_reviews.title: The best handy, yoga kit!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this yoga kit. The mat is the best I’ve ever used, as it really does prevent me from slipping. The blocks, the strap and the handy case are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Waugh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the Price
customer_reviews.text: If you are starting out in Yoga, then this is for you. Great product. I just started DDP Yoga and bought this set for that. Works great and it is easy to keep together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic find
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this Yoga kit for about a month and is worth every penny. The strap is of high quality and is very long. The mat is of perfect size too especially since I am over 5'10" so my feet don't change off like other yoga mats do. The blocks are sturdy and everything fits perfectly in the tote, which has supportive straps at the bottom so the blocks don't shuffle around in the bag. I am very pleased and highly recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Moore

customer_reviews.title: Wanted a thicker mat
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, and accessories I do not like the feel of the towel
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and light weight!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that you had a bag that would hold all of the items and that they were not only well made but that you had a nice selection of colors available. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Boyles

customer_reviews.title: I just received my yoga kit on Sunday and took ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received my yoga kit on Sunday and took it with me to my yoga class, my instructor was very impressed with the quality and content and I am very please with it also
customer_reviews.author: Bea Greer-Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good deal on Yoga package.
customer_reviews.text: I liked all the items purchased - yoga mat, towel, blocks, strap, and the bag my preference is a cloth bag which I did not check closely to see if it was a cloth bag. The plastic or vinyl will work but am shopping locally for cloth bag. Great deal and have used everyday since last week when received it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. The towel, blocks and mat are all good quality. Carrying bag is convenient and well made. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MrTMP

customer_reviews.title: it arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: It arrived as promised and appears to work. New to yoga so I am learning what we need to become more flexible and relaxed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It okay not great
customer_reviews.text: The mat and towels are excellent, which is the real reason I purchased this but the blocks and strap are slightly smaller than studio size; so I end up using theirs anyway and the bag is cheap. Maybe it’s just me but it’s a struggle to get everything back in just right so it closes properly.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Best set ever
customer_reviews.text: I love the set. I just started doing yoga so this is perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Have used the set 3 times so far, perfect gripping for yoga, really appreciated that it didn’t have a foul smell upon opening it. Very well made. Towels high quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Otamendi

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome yoga kit
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome yoga kit! Clever Yoga has wonderful customer service. We received the wrong product and they worked really quickly to correct and get the correct item to us. The mat is soft and thick, and the blocks, strap and towels are great accessories to my yoga practice.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Overall good, great price but the mat is eh.
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome deal for everything you get. Love that it all packs up nicely. Only complaint is that I don't love the yoga mat. It's really lightweight and moves around on the floor too easily when I try to use it, it doesn't grip the ground like yoga mats usually do. It's also a bit thick, which is nice on the knees but it makes wrist stability in some postures harder and more painful for me. Could probably use it for other fitness activities, though.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Barish

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat but...
customer_reviews.text: They sent me two different blocks. One was slightly 2cm larger and had dents, like it had been repackaged. The symmetry of it was important.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Bradley

customer_reviews.title: All in one
customer_reviews.text: I needed everything in that bag for my yoga class so this kit was totally worth it for me. Mat is a little thin compared to other but I mean it does the job. The bag was very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for being an awesome company!
customer_reviews.text: Everything in the bag was a great color and has helped me with beginning yoga. Customer service for this business is also on point and I'll absolutely purchase from them again if I need any additional yoga supplies.
customer_reviews.author: spydermeg

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great yoga set for the beginner. I did not want to spend a lot of money on equipment and find out yoga was not for me; this has been a perfect starter set! It has everything I need for my yoga routines and will hold-up for many to come.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a curious beginner
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything you need as a beginner. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner and there is everything I need in one carrying bag. The quality of the items impressed my yoga teacher and she agreed the price is a very good deal. The mat is so comfortable even my old knees can take it without complaining. Thanks Clever Yoga for a very fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Old Muleskinner

customer_reviews.title: Yoga kit
customer_reviews.text: Good quality products and a great value. I like that the essentials are all there and very happy that the mat doesn't smell bad. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: PFG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect yoga kit
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and how soft the mat and towel is. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Scott Owen

customer_reviews.title: Good product but need to redesign the carry case
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The only issue is that the carry case is really too narrow and short so it is difficult to put the yoga mat in !
customer_reviews.author: Francois LHeureux

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for those who are getting started. It comes with everything in a carrying bag for easy travel.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: So far very good!
customer_reviews.text: Received both orders, thanks. Looks good. Purchased for home use as the local studio provides everything needed.
customer_reviews.author: Fjpruss1951

customer_reviews.title: Blocks were a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The mat and towels were very good. However, the blocks were lacking. I ended up buy cork blocks separately. Save your money on the blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Randal

customer_reviews.title: Beach yoga
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for beach yoga and have been extremely happy with everything. The material is thick and made to hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Kern

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Mat, blocks, and towels in a great carrying case. I was impressed
customer_reviews.author: Judy Andrews

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can carry my mat
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can carry my mat, towel, blocks and strap with me. Everything is beautiful and lively to use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mingo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great bundle. Everything you need and very reasonable. Excited to try hot yoga!
customer_reviews.author: jetladuke

customer_reviews.text: Great quality, perfect set and soft mat for feet comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Gentle Yoga
customer_reviews.text: Matt is soft and strong. The blocks are very supportive. Great investment for your health.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brown

customer_reviews.title: The Clever yoga kit is nice. I've enjoyed using it
customer_reviews.text: The Clever yoga kit is nice. I've enjoyed using it. The bag is roomy enough to add other items. It would have been nice if the bag had a shoulder strap on it. I would highly recommend the yoga kit.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit! Packaging is great and every piece of the kit is made with the best materials. The towels are so soft. Thank you for working so hard to bring us amazing products!
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality yoga kit. It comes with a bag that everything fits in. I ordered the blue and love the color. The shipping was fast and arrived on schedule. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It came with everything I needed and it’s perfect. The towel is really good too! Also impressed with that mat.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Baker

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a 2nd for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift from her was so I great I got her 1 in pink. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my friend who is an instructor. She loved it and is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Richie Dynamite

customer_reviews.title: Yoga kit
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed my new Yoga kit. Love that everything fits with a bit of extra room in the carry bag!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Porter

customer_reviews.title: For the yogi on the go!
customer_reviews.text: This is sweet! I am always on the go finding parks to practice and my trunk gets cluttered with equipment. This has everything I need to grab and go and keep it together! Great starter kit for the Newby too. I'll recommend for my newer students!
customer_reviews.author: kristin barber

customer_reviews.title: Yoga mat, 2 blocks, strap, carry case, yoga towel, yoga hand towel.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality of all items in the yoga kit. Pretty color. Anxious to try it out when my gym opens up.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ernst

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a gift for someone else and they love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone else and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: EyeCThingsClearly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift and he loves and uses it daily
customer_reviews.author: Jes G.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter kit. However, after a month I have realized that I use my mat a lot more than a beginner and I beat it up. I needed to upgrade to a manduka pro. It would be good for beginners and those who only practice yoga 1-5 times a month.
customer_reviews.author: Aray

customer_reviews.title: A nice 'all-in-one' deal for a new yoga-ist.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good value. The mat, blocks and strap work nicely. The towel is a bonus. The only thing that would give it more utility is a small zipper pocket on the bag, for holding keys and wallet in a specified location.
customer_reviews.author: John McG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect kit for my first yoga classes. Good quality, like the colors and hope to use often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOULD BUY AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: QUALITY products! I love my new set. I have used each piece several times and they are very comfortable. GREAT carrying case as well
customer_reviews.author: Kim K.

customer_reviews.title: Mat Only
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 7 piece kit for $78 and only received the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality items and love the bag
customer_reviews.text: For a beginner yogi, this kit has everything you need. Good quality items and love the bag!

customer_reviews.title: She loves her gift and has recommended this company to others in her yoga group
customer_reviews.text: Purchased item as a gift for my Daughter-n-law. She loves her gift and has recommended this company to others in her yoga group. Very easy to contact seller with any questions you might have. I would highly recommend this product, very good price for high quality merchandise. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do yoga with my baby and i love how soft it is!

customer_reviews.title: Love IT !!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality and GREAT customer service. This kit is for a Christmas present and is very well put together. I am proud to give this as a gift and will do business with them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri W.

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I didn't like about it was the blocks seemed unstable
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't like about it was the blocks seemed unstable. They were not heavy and did not feel strong. My yoga teacher gave me two of her old ones. Otherwise it is a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This company is fantastic to work with! And the product is a great quality!

customer_reviews.title: Timely and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Delivery timely and this is great set and everything is quality.

customer_reviews.text: It will fit what my wife needed. The pad is a little thin but it will do. Easy to handle.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great deal especially with the carrying case and put everything ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal especially with the carrying case and put everything in it that you need just love it

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Kit. The mat is perfect thickness and very ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Kit. The mat is perfect thickness and very supportive. The towels are great material and the carrying case fits everything perfectly

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it to anyone looking to get started
customer_reviews.text: As a total beginning at yoga, this kit had everything I needed for my first class. Everything worked perfectly. I'd recommend it to anyone looking to get started.

customer_reviews.author: Diana.

customer_reviews.title: Love my yoga kit!!
customer_reviews.text: I previously left a low rating review, however after a positive communication with the seller and resolution to my concern, I have changed the review to reflect the experience. The yoga equipment is good quality and is comfortable to use. I am doing hot yoga 5 times a week and the equipment is supportive and resilient. The communication with the seller was positive, enabling me to have my concerns addressed. It was evident that the seller cares about their customers, I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Yoga Set Kit 7-Piece 1 Yoga Mat, Yoga Mat Towel, 2 Yoga Blocks, Yoga Strap, Yoga Hand Towel, Free Carry Case for Exercises Yogis and Mom
feature_bullets: PERFORM MOVEMENTS COMFORTABLY ON OUR BEST SELLING MAT: The BetterGrip Yoga Mat has double-sided textured surfaces to give you the most comfortable, non slip yoga mat experience possible. The extra thick yoga mat (6mm) protects joints without compromising support or stability and is the perfect beginner yoga mat. And at 72" long x 25 1/4" wide it's more spacious than most other yoga mats
